Located in the western part pf Moldavia in the
, Slănic Moldova is known for its mineral springs.
There are hourly buses from the nearby town
(a 15 minutes trip), which has connections by rail with most parts of Romania.
The resort is walkable. You can go and see the mineral springs.
If you want to visit
, you can get in the car and drive 17 kilometers.

The most important thing to see here is the mineral springs, which are drinkable and help people to treat sick and some deseases.
The mountains are rich in sulfur and iron, that's why the springs are rich in minerals.

In the neighbour of the Town Hall, there is wireless internet for free and anyone can acces it anytime. 
Another thing to do is to go to ghe mineral springs through the town park and see the picturesque image of the mountains around the village.

A lot of souvenirs are available here.
Also, near the town park the is a complex where anyone can find clothes, magazines and food stores.
There are a lot of places where you can drink anyhing.
Accommodations are available in guesthouses (prices starting around €12/night) and several hotels. The most important hotels are Eurovacanţa (***) and Nemira (****).
